title: FS: T206 Ty Cobb (Bat Off Shoulder) SGC 50
author: robw1959

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Ty Cobb (Bat Off Shoulder) SGC 50
posts.post_content:
This is a very solid 4, and certainly better than any of the PSA 4 examples of Cobb that have sold recently - in the past six months - for as much as $14000+ on eBay. No creases, stains, or scuffs; clean front and back with decent centering on both sides. Asking net $12000 shipped, PayPal preferred.
